@graph.name: Mushroom Gnocchi with Broccoli - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These creamy mushroom gnocchi with broccoli make such an easy, comforting, and delicious dinner! They're vegan and ready in only 15 minutes! You will LOVE this recipe!

@graph.headline: Mushroom Gnocchi with Broccoli
@graph.keywords: gnocchi mushroom cream sauce,gnocchi mushroom sauce,gnocchi mushroom sauce recipe,gnocchi with mushrooms,how to make mushroom gnocchi,mushroom gnocchi,mushroom gnocchi recipe,mushroom gnocchi without cream

@graph.name: Mushroom Gnocchi with Broccoli
@graph.description: These creamy mushroom gnocchi with broccoli make such an easy, comforting, and delicious dinner! They're vegan and ready in only 15 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 1 17.6 oz package store-bought gnocchi (make sure to choose a vegan brand!)
9 oz white button or cremini mushrooms, sliced
2 teaspoons white or yellow miso paste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the gnocchi according to the instructions on the package together with the broccoli florets. Drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the gnocchi according to the instructions on the package together with the broccoli florets. Drain and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, heat some oil and sauté the mushrooms for about 2 minutes. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pot, heat some oil and sauté the mushrooms for about 2 minutes. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Now make the sauce. Add all ingredients in a high speed blender and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Now make the sauce. Add all ingredients in a high speed blender and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the sauce into the pot you used for the mushrooms and heat for about 2 minutes until it considerably thickens up.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the sauce into the pot you used for the mushrooms and heat for about 2 minutes until it considerably thickens up.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the gnocchi, the broccoli, and the mushrooms. Stir well and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Add the gnocchi, the broccoli, and the mushrooms. Stir well and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Enjoy!
